channel.title: Bunch of questions

item.title: Bunch of questions
item.dc:creator: @Skiddle Skiddle
item.description:
@Skiddle wrote:

Buck i swear to god, quit trying to get your fucking post count and member status up, you go to all my posts and give me NO help. IM NOT USING A DIFF SOURCE, IF YOU DONT LIKE IT GO THE HELL ON. You prolly don’t know how to do ANY OF THIS. Rs2e is the most stable pk source around, most stable source period, im not gonna change it cause some noob who goes around posting pointless shit said to.

It gives the stat the same way a potion does, if you take a drink of a super pot you get more stats say 118/99

This gives you “356779/99”

Are you following yet!?

Read full topic

item.title: Bunch of questions
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

you’re using a handler huh…
do it like this then

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && p.playerRights >= 2) { for(int j = 0; j < 21; j++) { p.addSkillXP(14000000, j); } }

item.title: Bunch of questions
item.dc:creator: @Skiddle Skiddle
item.description:
@Skiddle wrote:

I want to add a ::master code in this server, “Rs2e”. The code to gain exp atm is “::addxp 0-6 999999999” Can anyone tell me how to add a ::master?

Code for this looks like…

else if(command.startsWith("addxp")) { String[] s = command.split(" "); p.addSkillXP(Integer.parseInt(s[2]), Integer.parseInt(s[1])); }

Also adding a npc that I talk to, and he teles me somewhere, example a wizard that when i click teleport takes me to edge.

Read full topic
